name: Patagonia Strider Pro Shorts - Men's
description:
Ultra-lightweight trail running shorts to help you go the distance. The Strider Pro Shorts are stretchy and have side splits for full range of motion. Plenty of pockets give you room for gels, keys, your phone, a weather-resistant shell – anything you need to help you run far.Ultralight, fast-drying recycled polyester ripstop fabric with DWR finish for highly breathable water resistance.Built-in polyester crepe boxer-brief liner wicks moisture and provides chafe-free comfort. Polygiene odour-control treatment keeps things fresh.Minimalist waistband with drawcord gives you a customized fit.1 zippered back pocket and 4 drop-in hip pockets offer plenty of options for gels and other essentials.

        Sustainability
